moves: 1. e4 c5 2. Ne2 Nf6 3. Nbc3 Nc6 4. g3 d5 5. exd5 Nxd5 6. Bg2 Nxc3 7. bxc3
comment:
Opening the "b" column, where a Rook,
helping the action of the Bishop in g2 on the big diagonal, can increase the
pressure on the opponent's field.  7...

moves: 1. e4 c5 2. Ne2 Nf6 3. Nbc3 Nc6 4. g3 d5 5. exd5 Nxd5 6. Bg2 Nxc3 7. bxc3 e6 8. O-O Be7 9. Rb1 O-O 10. c4
comment:
This move has an advantage and a disadvantage. The advantage: White can place
a Bishop on the diagonal a1-g8; the disadvantage: it weakens the control of
the d4 square, which can become a good base for Black counterplay.  10...
